summary: Completed testing of SPX Regimes, Constitution, and Governance tabs. Backend APIs working perfectly with comprehensive data, but frontend data loading has critical integration issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Content not rendering - showing dark placeholder blocks instead of regime matrix and KPI cards
Content not rendering - showing dark placeholder blocks instead of constitution policies
Content not rendering - showing dark placeholder blocks instead of backtest results

integration_issues.issue: All SPX tabs (Regimes, Constitution, Governance) show loading placeholders but never render actual data despite backend APIs working

passed_tests: SPX tab switching works (Regimes, Constitution, Governance tabs are selectable)
Backend APIs return comprehensive data (19,061 regime days, 113,889 outcome samples, 17 constitution policies, full backtest results)
All backend endpoints respond with 200 status and well-structured data
Asset selector correctly switches to SPX Terminal
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend data integration for SPX tabs. All backend APIs are working perfectly with comprehensive data (regimes: 19,061 days, outcomes: 113,889 samples, constitution: 17 policies, backtest: 4 periods), but frontend components are not rendering the data. Check JavaScript console errors, API call integration, and loading state handling in SpxRegimesTab.jsx, SpxConstitutionTab.jsx, and SpxGovernanceTab.jsx.
